name: Browser
description: Access the browser that is running the web app.

conditions.name: Cookies enabled
conditions.description: Browser has cookies enabled.

conditions.name: Is online
conditions.description: Browser is online (i.e. not in an offline browsing mode).

conditions.name: On went online
conditions.description: Triggered when user is offline and a connection becomes available.

conditions.name: On went offline
conditions.description: Triggered when user is online and the connection becomes unavailable.

conditions.name: On resized
conditions.description: Triggered when the current browser viewport is resized.

conditions.name: Is portrait/landscape
conditions.description: Check the current orientation of the device.

params.name: Orientation
params.description: Select the orientation to test.

conditions.name: On back button
conditions.description: Triggers when device 'Back' button is pressed.  Note not all devices have a 'Back' button.

conditions.name: Is fullscreen
conditions.description: True if the page is currently in fullscreen mode.

conditions.name: On update ready
conditions.description: Triggers when an update has finished downloading in the background.

conditions.name: On update found
conditions.description: Triggers upon starting to download an update in the background.

conditions.name: On offline ready
conditions.description: Triggers on the first run when finished saving resources for offline support.

conditions.name: On hash change
conditions.description: Triggered when the part of the URL after the hash (#) is changed.

conditions.name: On install available
conditions.description: Triggered when PWA install becomes available.

conditions.name: Is install available
conditions.description: True after 'On install available' when PWA install is available.

conditions.name: On install result
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request install' identifying the outcome of the install request.

params.name: Result
params.description: The result of the install request.

conditions.name: On app installed
conditions.description: Triggered after requesting install, the user accepting the prompt, and the app install then successfully completing.

conditions.name: Compare display mode
conditions.description: Compare the current app display mode. Typically PWAs are shown in 'standalone' mode.

params.name: Display mode
params.description: The display mode to check.

conditions.name: Warn on close is enabled
conditions.description: True if the 'Set warn on close' action has been used to enable warning on close.

conditions.name: On focus
conditions.description: Triggered when the window becomes focused.

conditions.name: On blur
conditions.description: Triggered when the window loses focus.

conditions.name: Has focus
conditions.description: True when the window currently has focus.

conditions.name: On fullscreen error
conditions.description: Triggered when a request to enter fullscreen mode was refused by the browser.

conditions.name: On window maximized
conditions.description: Triggered when the main app window is maximized.

conditions.name: On window minimized
conditions.description: Triggered when the main app window is minimized.

actions.name: Log
actions.description: Log a message to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

params.name: Type
params.description: Choose the type of message to log to the browser console.

params.name: Message
params.description: Enter the message text to log to the browser console.

actions.name: Start group
actions.description: Start a message group in the browser console.

params.name: Group name
params.description: Enter the group name to add to the browser console.

actions.name: End group
actions.description: End a message group in the browser console.

actions.name: Vibrate
actions.description: Vibrate with a specified pattern if the device (e.g. phone) supports it.

params.name: Pattern
params.description: A comma-separated string with a list of times in milliseconds, describing a pattern of vibrations and pauses.

actions.name: Go back
actions.description: Go to the previous page in browser history.

actions.name: Go forward
actions.description: Go to the next page in browser history.

actions.name: Go to URL
actions.description: Navigate to a URL.

params.name: URL
params.description: Enter the full URL to navigate to.

params.name: Target
params.description: Which frame level to navigate. Only has an effect when using frames in a web browser.

actions.name: Open URL in new window
actions.description: Open a new window and navigate to a URL.
actions.display_text: Go to {0} in a new window ([i]{1}[/i])

params.name: URL
params.description: Enter the full URL to navigate to.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A string to identify this window.  You can reuse an existing window by reusing its tag.

actions.name: Reload
actions.description: Reload the current page.  Also updates if an 'On update ready' event has triggered.

actions.name: Invoke download
actions.description: Start a file download of a data URI, project file or web address.

params.name: URL
params.description: A data URI, project file, or any website address to invoke as a download.

params.name: Filename
params.description: The filename to give the downloaded file.

actions.name: Invoke download of string
actions.description: Start a file download of data given in a string, e.g. JSON.
actions.display_text: Invoke download of string [b]{0}[/b] with MIME type [i]{1}[/i] and filename [i]{2}[/i]

params.name: String
params.description: A string of data to download as a file, e.g. JSON data from the AsJSON expression.

params.name: MIME type
params.description: The MIME type of the given data.

params.name: Filename
params.description: The filename to give the downloaded file.

actions.name: Alert
actions.description: Pop up a message box with a message and an OK button.

params.name: Message
params.description: Enter the message to display in the alert.

actions.name: Close
actions.description: Close the current browser window or tab.  The browser may prompt the user to confirm.

actions.name: Focus
actions.description: Focus the current browser window or tab.

actions.name: Blur
actions.description: Blur (unfocus) the current browser window or tab.

actions.name: Request fullscreen
actions.description: Request the user to enter fullscreen mode. Usually this only works in a user input trigger.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Determine how the game viewport is displayed in the monitor area.

params.name: Navigation UI
params.description: Whether the browser should still display some user interface controls while in fullscreen mode. Typically only affects mobile browsers.

actions.name: Cancel fullscreen
actions.description: Exit fullscreen mode.

actions.name: Lock orientation
actions.description: Prevent the orientation of the device changing.

params.name: Orientation
params.description: The orientation to lock the device to. This may only take effect if already in fullscreen mode.

actions.name: Unlock orientation
actions.description: Restore normal device orientation after locking.

actions.name: Load stylesheet
actions.description: Load a Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) from a URL and apply it to the document.

params.name: URL
params.description: URL to load CSS from. This can be a project file URL, e.g. "mystyle.css".

actions.name: Set hash
actions.description: Set the part of the URL after the hash (#) symbol. This does not reload the page.

params.name: Hash
params.description: New string to set after the hash (#) symbol in the URL.

actions.name: Set CSS style
actions.description: Set a CSS style on elements in the document matching a CSS selector.

params.name: Property name
params.description: A CSS property name to set on the HTML element.

params.name: Value
params.description: A string to assign as the value for this CSS property.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match elements.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to affect one element matching the selector, or all matching elements.

actions.name: Get CSS style
actions.description: Get the computed value of a CSS property from an element in the document.

params.name: Property name
params.description: The CSS property name to get.

params.name: Selector
params.description: A CSS selector which will be used to match the element.

params.name: Tag
params.description: A tag to later retrieve this value with.

actions.name: Set window size
actions.description: Set the main window size. (Note: may not be allowed in browsers in some cases.)

params.name: Width
params.description: The window width to set.

params.name: Height
params.description: The window height to set.

actions.name: Set window position
actions.description: Set the main window position. (Note: may not be allowed in browsers in some cases.)

params.name: X
params.description: The window X position to set.

params.name: Y
params.description: The window Y position to set.

actions.name: Request install
actions.description: When install is available, prompt the user to install the page as an app. This may only be allowed in a user input event.

actions.name: Set warn on close
actions.description: Enable a prompt to confirm upon closing the browser tab or window.

params.name: Warn on close
params.description: Whether to enable a prompt to confirm closing.

actions.name: Maximize window
actions.description: Maximize the main app window.

actions.name: Minimize window
actions.description: Minimize the main app window.

actions.name: Restore window
actions.description: Restore the main app window to its original size and position if it was maximized or minimized.

expressions.name: Platform
expressions.description: Get the browser platform (e.g. Windows, Mac).

expressions.name: UserAgent
expressions.description: Get the full browser user agent string.

expressions.name: Protocol
expressions.description: Get the current protocol, e.g. http:.

expressions.name: Domain
expressions.description: Get the current domain, e.g. construct.net.

expressions.name: PathName
expressions.description: Get the path relative to domain.

expressions.name: Hash
expressions.description: Get the hash from the URL, e.g. #myAnchor.

expressions.name: Referrer
expressions.description: Get the referrer (the page that linked to this page).

expressions.name: QueryString
expressions.description: Get the full query string, including the ?.

expressions.name: QueryParam
expressions.description: Get a query string parameter by name.

params.name: name
params.description: Query string parameter name.

expressions.name: Port
expressions.description: Get the port specified in the current URL if any, e.g. 443.

expressions.name: CSSStyleValue
expressions.description: Get the result value for a tag after 'Get CSS style' completes.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to retrieve the value for.

expressions.name: DisplayMode
expressions.description: A string of the current app display mode, e.g. "browser" or "standalone".

expressions.name: InstallResult
expressions.description: In 'On install result', a string of the install result, e.g. "accepted" or "dismissed".
